text.language: Eyrenerp~emp~sa: e~fai n~nenjij e~p~swi: harok m~pekm~yo: ,wric jwnt nem mokmek efhwou.
That we may be worthy, to lift up our hands, before You without anger, or evil thoughts.

language.div: Layakkanlah kami, ‘tuk mengangkat tangan kami, di hadapan-Mu tanpa amarah, atau pikiran jahat.

text.language: لنستحق أن نرفع أيدينا اليك أمامك بغير غضب ولا فكر ردىء.
Qen tai hana~tooui~: coutwn nenmwit e~qoun: nem nenmwit e~bol: qen p~ounof n~te tekc~kep/.
At this dawn, make straight our coming in, and our going out, in the joy of Your protection.

language.div: Saat fajar, luruskan jalan, masuk dan keluar kami, dalam sukacita perlindungan-Mu.

text.language: فى هذا السحر سهل طرقنا الداخلية والخارجية بسترك المفرح.
Eyrenjw n~tekmeym/i: n~e~hoou niben: n~tenhwc e~tekjom: nem Dauid pip~rov/t/c.
That we may proclaim, Your righteousness daily, and praise Your power, with David the prophet.

language.div: Agar kami dapat memb’ritakan, Keb’naran-Mu setiap hari, dan puji kuasa-Mu

text.language: لننطق بعدلك كل يوم ونمجد قوتك مع داود النبى.
Je qen tekhir/n/: P,#c# Penc#w#r#: anenkot antwoun: je anerhelpic e~rok.
Saying "In Your peace, O Christ our Savior, we slept and arose, for we have hoped in You.

language.div: Mengatakan: Dalam damai-Mu, ya Kristus Jurus’lamat kami, kami tidur dan bangun, s’bab kami berharap pada-Mu.

text.language: قائلين بسلامك أيها المسيح مخلصنا رقدنا وقمنا لأننا توكلنا عليك.
